title: Vieira (Dr. Pedro Júlio)
body:
He was a native of this city and a doctor of medicine from the Montpellier school, having completed the respective course in 1852. He was the president of the Municipal Council of Funchal, interim doctor of the same Council's party, and doctor at the Hospício da Princeza D. Maria Amelia. E.:
> Medical Studies on the Climate of Madeira; thesis presented and publicly defended at the Faculty of Medicine of Montpellier; Montpellier, 1852, 91 pages.
He died in Funchal, at the age of 70, on October 28, 1897.
